Desc.entry: Community organisation for the residents of Khartoum, Thompson, Wadbrough, Walton Roads and adjacent part of Ecclesall road. Aims to help all residents whether permanent or temporary to live happily alongside each other. Delivers a brief monthly newsletter delivered to all the houses, holds an annual picnic in the Botanical Gardens, represents the experiences and views of members to local councillors, Police and Planning. Sends a representative to the Sheffield City Council's "Students in the Community" working group. Aims to monitor effectiveness of the parking scheme, work with landlords to reduce the amount of signage and improper use of wheelie bins, encourage more neighbourly behaviour by students and monitor planning applications which might affect the area.

Pubs.entry: Welcome To The Area, leaflet; Newsletter
